docs.title: CW5 Wiki
docs.text:
Welcome to the CW5 Wiki! This is a community-driven project to summarize data from the text-based MMORPG CW5.

Explore the pages for gameplay guides, item overviews, and more.

Disclaimer: This site is currently under development and may not be up-to-date. Information is subject to change as the project evolves, and contributions from the community are encouraged to help maintain accuracy.
